Stepped in on a quiet night to shake off the jet lag, and was thoroughly surprised by the craftsmanship of this place.  I could imagine this place in London, NYC, LA, or SF, but never imaged running into a place like this in a quiet residential street in Barcelona.  This place has a nice vibe about it, they have plenty top notice gin and the bartenders know how to knockout cocktails with it too.Tip: If you are going to drop 10 Euro on top shelf gin, go for the Fever Tree tonic so you can really savor the gin.This place was so good I sat a couple of seats down from Bobby Flay when he was in town.
